title: Remove HP Partner First Silver badge card from Certifications section

requirements.text: Remove the HP Partner First Silver badge card (including partner tier label and expiry date) entirely from the Certifications component. If this leaves the Certifications section empty, either remove the section entirely or display a placeholder message indicating no certifications are currently listed.
acceptanceCriteria: The HP Partner First Silver badge card is no longer visible on the page.
No broken layout or empty card containers remain in the Certifications section.
All other sections (Header, Hero, Services, Products, AMC, Footer) remain unaffected.

nonGoals: Modifying any section other than Certifications.
Adding new certifications or partner logos.
Changing the overall page layout or design theme.
